outline:
1. to dig, cleave, divide, hew, make, cut out, dig out, cut down, quarry, hewer, mason
    1. (Qal)
      1. to hew out, dig
      2. to hew
        1. stone
        2. wood
      3. to hew in pieces (metaph.)
      4. to divide, cleave
    2. (Niphal) to be cut, be hewn, be engraved
    3. (Hiphil) to hew into pieces, cut up into pieces
    4. (Pual) to be cut from, be hewn from
kjv_def: cut, dig, divide, grave, hew (out, -er), made, mason.
strongs_def: to cut or carve (wood, stone or other material); by implication, to hew, split, square, quarry, engrave
